headline: How Investors May Respond To Paycom Software (PAYC) Elevating Automation and Tech Leadership in Executive Shakeup
summary: On August 18, 2025, Paycom Software expanded Shane Hadlock's role to chief client officer and chief technology officer, promoted Rachael Gannon to chief automation officer, and named Brad Smith as senior technical strategist, reflecting a comprehensive realignment of its executive team. This leadership reshuffle highlights Paycom's focus on strengthening its technology, automation, and client service capabilities through experienced in-house talent. We'll explore how Paycom's leadership...
